data.comment: The match has started.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Fortaleza.
In the minute 3, In Fortaleza Paranaense drive forward through Vinicius Mingotti. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Goal kick for Fortaleza at Estadio Castelao.
Ball safe as Paranaense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 7, Fortaleza are pushing forward but David's finish is wide of the goal.
Paranaense have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Paranaense in their own half.
In the minute 8, David (Fortaleza) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Fortaleza to take a throw-in in Paranaense territory.
Throw-in Paranaense.
In the minute 9, Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Paranaense.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a Paranaense throw-in in Fortaleza's half.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
In the minute 13, Fortaleza awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Fortaleza in the half of Paranaense.
In Fortaleza Paranaense attack through Leo Cittadini. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 14, Ball goes out of play for a Fortaleza goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Fortaleza at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 16, Braulio da Silva Machado awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Fortaleza get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Paranaense's half?
Free kick for Paranaense in their own half.
In the minute 19, Braulio da Silva Machado awards Paranaense a goal kick.
In Fortaleza, Richard of Paranaense is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Vitinho scores to make it 0-1 at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 22, Jonathan instrumental with a fine assist.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a Paranaense throw-in in Fortaleza's half.
Paranaense are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 30, Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Braulio da Silva Machado.
Corner awarded to Paranaense.
Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Braulio da Silva Machado.
In the minute 33, Leo Cittadini for Paranaense gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Fortaleza have a goal kick.
Can Fortaleza get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Paranaense's half?
In the minute 34, Fortaleza to take a throw-in in Paranaense territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Fortaleza.
In the minute 36, Paranaense drives forward and Fernando Canesin gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Wellington Paulista for Fortaleza drives towards goal at Estadio Castelao. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Can Fortaleza capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Paranaense's half?
In the minute 38, Paranaense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Paranaense in the half of Fortaleza.
At Estadio Castelao, Juninho has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 40, Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Fortaleza in the half of Paranaense.
In the minute 43, Fortaleza have been awarded a corner by Braulio da Silva Machado.
Paranaense's Maycon Nikao misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Fortaleza at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 45, At Estadio Castelao the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Corner awarded to Fortaleza.
Ball goes out of play for a Paranaense goal kick.
In the minute 45, Free kick Paranaense.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
Goal! Leo Cittadini extends Paranaense's lead to 0-2.
Vinicius Mingotti with an assist there.
The second-half has started.
Fortaleza pushes forward through Wellington Paulista, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 56, The match at Estadio Castelao has been interrupted briefly for a check on Richard, who is down injured.
Kawan (Paranaense) has replaced the possibly injured Richard.
Yuri Cesar is replacing Wellington Paulista for Fortaleza at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 59, Jonathan is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Jonathan for Paranaense is back on the field again.
Throw-in for Fortaleza in the half of Paranaense.
In the minute 61, It's a goal kick for the away team in Fortaleza.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
Fortaleza are whistled for offside.
In the minute 62, Can Paranaense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fortaleza's half?
It seems as if Jonathan is unable to continue. Khellven replaces him for the away team.
In the minute 64, Paranaense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Christian is on a sub for Fernando Canesin for Paranaense.
Braulio da Silva Machado awards the home team a throw-in.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
In the minute 66, Braulio da Silva Machado awards Paranaense a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Paranaense goal kick.
In the minute 68, In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the away team.
He's off! Juan Quintero is shown a red card.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Maycon Nikao.
Free kick Paranaense.
In the minute 70, Maycon Nikao is back on his feet again.
Maycon Nikao of Paranaense smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a Paranaense throw-in in Fortaleza's half.
Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
In the minute 71, Jackson is replacing Osvaldo for the home team.
Fortaleza make their third substitution with Marlon replacing David.
In the minute 71, Kawan (Paranaense) has received a yellow card from Braulio da Silva Machado.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Fortaleza in the half of Paranaense.
In the minute 72, Christian (Paranaense) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in Paranaense.
Paranaense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 76, Fortaleza's Romarinho gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Castelao. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
The home team replace Juninho with Tiago Orobo.
In the minute 77, The home team replace Romarinho with Derley.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
Dorival Silvestre Junior is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio Castelao with Carlos Eduardo replacing Leo Cittadini.
In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 80, The away team have replaced Vinicius Mingotti with Lucho Gonzalez. This is the fifth substitution made today by Dorival Silvestre Junior.
Felipe (Fortaleza) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 81, Paranaense have a dangerous throw-in.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Paranaense.
Fortaleza's Paulao has been booked in Fortaleza.
In the minute 83, Throw-in high up the field for Paranaense in Fortaleza.
Paranaense to take a throw-in in Fortaleza territory.
Goal kick for Fortaleza at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 87, Paranaense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yuri Cesar (Fortaleza) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Paranaense have a goal kick.
In the minute 89, Paranaense are coming forward and Lucho Gonzalez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Braulio da Silva Machado awards Fortaleza a goal kick.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Fortaleza.
Derley of Fortaleza gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fortaleza.
Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Braulio da Silva Machado.
The match has come to a close in Fortaleza. The final score is 0-2.
